Message.Title: GOP smart to attack Susan Rice,
Message.Msg: She is both a women and black. Clearly in the rabbit hole slitting your throat is viewed as a big positive. LOL If only she was half black half hispanic it would be perfect!!! And the Republicans, having lost the election because Americans want cooperation and laser-like-focus by Congress on the economy, should have learned a lesson about gridlock. They also hopefully have learned that women, minorities, and young voters don’t like the GOP message. Now, BAM!, the GOP goes after a black woman ambassador whom Obama wants to nominate as the Secretary of State. Good idea I think not. Susan Rice is an intelligent and articulate diplomat. She was given intelligence information on the Behghazi, Libya by US intelligence which she foolishly repeated on TV – that a spontaneous demonstration by angry Muslims over a YouTube video insulting the Prophet Mohammed was responsible for the attack. While that was probably incorrect it does NOT rise to the level of a Watergate-Like Hearing. Especially since the Republicans cut funding for diplomatic security and THAT can easily be made the issue of why there was not more robust security at the consulate.That COULD be an issue only if Democrats decide to get some “loin” and strike at the Republicans over those cuts which does not seem likely since the democrats seem to have become pussycats. Some feel that God sent Superstorm Sandy to punish Republicans and give Obama the election. Now one of my students send me an e mail asking if God was punishing Republicans for continuing to squabble and make hay out of the Libyan tragedy by starting a war between Israel and the Palestinians. I hardly believe that God has time to micro manage! But it is true that every time the GOP leadership tries to grab headlines on Benghazi something else happens to suck all the oxygen out of those hearings. Now it is the renewed war between Israel and the Palestinians – in other words a new Middle East crisis. It’s almost as if the GOP has tin ears that can’t hear what voters and Americans in general want.

What's different? Egypt, Turkey, and Jordan always support Palestinian demands. Some of them even supply the rockets.

Even if they don't actually call them "human shields," International Law does specify that civilians are not to be placed in harms way by locating firing positions of rockets in a populated area. It's in the Geneva Conventions. Silly Hamas should read the rules of engagement.

hello, the concentration camps that Israel has confined the Palestinians to, after they took their land, are the most populated area in the world. It is physically impossible for the Gaza militants to put weapons that are not embedded into civilians. Oh and by the way bombing peoples houses isn't exactly bombing weapons is it? Geneva convention doesn't allow that either,but then torture like W did isn't allowed either, why are you baggers all of sudden so attuned to the Geneva Convention when Bush is a convicted War Criminal under the GC?

Not in any section ratified by the US Senate. It was never ratified to include deep emotional stress. Makes a lot of sense not to ratify such a stupid concept. Reading your posts is enough to cause deep emotional stress to some people. I would say your post are torture.

Waterbording causes no permanent physical damage. The "offically ratified" definition of torture requires permenant physical damage. Now, certianly, some liberals have testified that they experienced waterboarding, and delclared it torture, but who is going to give credibility to a person WHO ADMITS HAVING PERMANENT MENTAL AND EMOTIONAL DAMAGE?

"the concentration camps that Israel has confined the Palestinians to, after they took their land, are the most populated area in the world. It is physically impossible for the Gaza militants to put weapons that are not embedded into civilians" The point is almost moot. Both sides are in violation of the law. Both sides should figure out that the international community is not interested in either of the lawbreakers. We just act like we care, and our diplomats talk about them without actually taking any action.

Topic.Title: there won't be a cease fire...at least not for long

Message.Msg: You are a person with no conscience and your moral value is dark and twisted. FYI, this has all started because Israel wanted to test the effectiveness of their new "iron dome" weapons in a battlefield. Israel needed a dry run to prepare for their confrontation with Iran, so Israel initiated this latest conflict by first killing an unarmed Palestinian civilian at the border crossing but didn't receive any retaliatory response from the Hamas. Then few days later, Israel killed a 13 year boy to incite provocation but still did not get the adequate response from Hamas. So, Israel went ahead to assassinate one of Hamas military leader which finally driven the Hamas into a frenzy and retaliating with their rockets. Israel now has a chance to really test their “iron dome” weapons in a real battle. This was all orchestrated by Israel right from the beginning with no regards to human lives.

guess you don't remember the Japanese that were convicted of war crimes by the U.S. for water boarding, LOL no small brain water boarding is a violation of the geneva convention, W will be declared a war criminal, maybe not while he is alive but he will go down with Hitler.

"Bush is a convicted War Criminal under the GC?" By what court? You are starting to sound like an idiot. Maybe you should change your ID to idiot.ivan. A "conviction" requires a court to convene on the matter.

"guess you don't remember the Japanese that were convicted of war crimes by the U.S. for water boarding, " I read portions of the trial transcripts of the trial to pursue the allegation. Wrong again, bozo. The Japanese were convicted of numerous violations, but waterboarding was mentioned a few times. It was not a specific charge that anyone was convicted of, ever. Waterboarding is an enhanced interogation method which causes no permanent physical injury. Mental injury wasn't even mentioned by the GC until the eighties. Are you stupid, or do you just ignore calendars?

The Grupo Bimbo Twinkie -- PERFECT!!! Hostess Brands, the bankrupt maker of Twinkies and Wonder Bread, said on Tuesday that it failed to reach a deal in mediation with the Bakery, Confectionary, Tobacco and Grain Millers Union. The ailing company, which also makes Wonder Bread and Drake's cakes, went to bankruptcy court on Monday to seek permission to liquidate its business, claiming that its operations were crippled by the bakers' strike and that winding down was the best way to preserve its dwindling cash. The company has blamed union wages and pension costs for contributing to its unprofitably. Hostess Chief Executive Gregory Rayburn has also said the company's labor contracts have deterred would-be bidders for the company and its assets. Bankers have said Mexico's Grupo Bimbo was interested in parts, but not all of, the brands.
